pageSetting.title: 贷款客户管理明细查询

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select substr(cast(mx.tjrq as char(8)),1,6) as tjrq ,jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, mx.khh, mx.zhhm, dmms.dmms as khlx, bz.bzzwmc, mx.jcbz, mx.tjxs, mx.khdkje,mx.khs,mx.jlje from (select khmx.tjrq , khmx.khdxdh,dkzh.khh, dkzh.zhhm, khmx.zhbs, khmx.jcbz, khmx.tjxs, khmx.khdkje,dkzh.bz,round(sum(khmx.khs),2) as khs,sum(khmx.jlje) as jlje from dkjx_dkkhgljxmx khmx inner join jxdx_dkzh dkzh on khmx.jxdxdh = dkzh.jxdxdh where 1=1 and dkzh.khh like '%$khh$%' and dkzh.zhhm like '%$zhhm$%' and khmx.zhbs = '$zhbs$' and khmx.khdkje between $khdkjexx$ and $khdkjesx$ and khmx.tjrq=$tjrq_ym$ group by khmx.tjrq ,khmx.khdxdh, dkzh.khh, dkzh.zhhm, khmx.zhbs, khmx.jcbz, khmx.tjxs, khmx.khdkje,dkzh.bz )mx inner join khdx_hy hy on mx.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and mx.tjrq between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = jgcy.jgkhdxdh inner join csb_dmms dmms on dmms.dmz = mx.zhbs and dmms.dmmc='ZHBS' inner join csb_bz bz on mx.bz = bz.bz inner join table(fn_getsjjg_java_qxhy($tjrq_ym$, $login_khdxdh$, 0)) qxhy on hy.khdxdh=qxhy.khdxdh where hy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$)

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select substr(cast(mx.tjrq as char(8)),1,6) as tjrq ,jg.jgdh, jg.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, mx.khh, mx.zhhm, dmms.dmms as khlx, bz.bzzwmc, mx.jcbz, mx.tjxs, mx.khdkje,mx.khs,mx.jlje from (select khmx.tjrq , khmx.khdxdh,dkzh.khh, dkzh.zhhm, khmx.zhbs, khmx.jcbz, khmx.tjxs, khmx.khdkje,dkzh.bz,round(sum(khmx.khs),2) as khs,sum(khmx.jlje) as jlje from dkjx_dkkhgljxmx khmx inner join jxdx_dkzh dkzh on khmx.jxdxdh = dkzh.jxdxdh where 1=1 and dkzh.khh like '%$khh$%' and dkzh.zhhm like '%$zhhm$%' and khmx.zhbs = '$zhbs$' and khmx.khdkje between $khdkjexx$ and $khdkjesx$ and khmx.tjrq=$tjrq_ym$ group by khmx.tjrq ,khmx.khdxdh, dkzh.khh, dkzh.zhhm, khmx.zhbs, khmx.jcbz, khmx.tjxs, khmx.khdkje,dkzh.bz )mx inner join khdx_hy hy on mx.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and mx.tjrq between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = jgcy.jgkhdxdh inner join csb_dmms dmms on dmms.dmz = mx.zhbs and dmms.dmmc='ZHBS' inner join csb_bz bz on mx.bz = bz.bz inner join table(fn_getsjjg_java_qxhy($tjrq_ym$, $login_khdxdh$, 0)) qxhy on hy.khdxdh=qxhy.khdxdh where hy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) ) t
